# Contributing to Project

Thank you for your interest in contributing!

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone: `git clone https://github.com/yourname/repo`
3. Create branch: `git checkout -b feature/my-feature`

## Development Setup

See README.md for setup instructions.

## Good First Issues

Look for issues labeled `good-first-issue` to get started. These are great for new contributors.

## Submitting Changes

1. Make your changes
2. Commit with clear messages
3. Push to your fork
4. Submit a pull request

## Code Review

All pull requests require code review before merging.

## Questions?

Open an issue with the `question` label.
